title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories on the x axis representing Country, and Female employees in each Country on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Latin America where Female employees is 58.5.
The lowest category is found at Asia where Female employees is 35.4.
The highest value at Latin America is almost 1.65 times larger than the minimum value of Asia.
The highest value at Latin America is almost 1.65 times larger than the minimum value of Asia.
The difference between the max Country Latin America and min Country Asia is 23.1.
